channel.title: Chris on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chris on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: METAL... uhh.. i mean hanson
item.description: So tonight I got home from work and rushed over to the house of blues to see hanson. my friend chris is friends with them so he hooked a bunch of us up with opera box seats.. and we hung out. it was really great. I was blown away by the talent and charisma that they held. it was intense. quite fun. we then hung out and just talked a bunch with them.
